description:
You will learn the individual requirements for qualifying to apply to get your Professional CCBA® or CBAP® certification with a step-by-step application process overview.

The course provides you with an easy to understand, pictorial synopsis with a video explanation of each BABOK® Knowledge Area to put the purpose and context of each topic into perspective. These video lessons are made up of diagrammatic summaries of each BABOK® Chapter which highlights the most important parts of each Chapter.

This course also includes the CCBA® & CBAP® preparation exam questions covering each chapter of the BABOK® Guide. This is the best way to prepare for your exam and to be confident that you have covered all of the BABOK® Guide v2.0!

Once you reviewed all the summary videos you will have a Knowledge Quiz to complete for each Chapter to test your knowledge! There are Knowledge Quizzes for the following Chapters:

    ·General Business Analysis

    ·Business Analysis Planning & Monitoring

    ·Elicitation

    ·Enterprise Analysis

    ·Requirements Analysis

    ·Solution Assessment & Validation

    ·Underlying Competencies

    ·Techniques

If you are interested in passing the CBAP® exam first time, you must do this course! It provides a fantastic overview of the BABOK® and prepares you in an interactive way which makes learning fun and easy!

This course is the best starting point for any Business Analyst that plans to get themselves ready to do the CCBA® or CBAP® certification. It will give you a very quick and thorough understanding of what is involved with learning the BABOK® Guide and it will instantly test your knowledge with similar questions to what you can expect in the real exam.

The course helps you to make the very detailed BABOK® Guide, which can be very daunting in itself, very straightforward and clear. Once you finish the course you will have a very comprehensive and knowledgeable level of understanding of the BABOK® Guide and the types of exam questions to expect.
title: Learn to become a Professional Business Analyst
